SEEALSO: Structure functions; Structure functions in the Developing ColdFusion Applications
DESCRIPTION: Searches recursively through a substructure of nested arrays, structures, and other elements, for structures whose values match the search key in the value parameter.
USAGE:
Returns an array that includes one structure for each of the specified values it finds. The fields of each of these structures are:

  • Value: value held in the found key

  • Path: string that can be used to reach the found key

  • Owner: parent object that contains the found key


    • A structureâ€™s keys are unordered.

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: ColdFusion object (structure or array) from which to start search. This parameter requires an object, not a name of an object.
String or a variable that contains one for which to search.
one: returns one matching key. Default. all: returns all matching keys. If the key is not found, an empty array is returned.
